text:
Greg Foot: So this is the eighth explanation
video for the 12 Explosions of Christmas.

I'm Greg -
Mike Sansom: and I'm Mike!

Greg: And we've just done the eight Brussels
sprouts cannons a'firing!
Yeah and it was epic!
It absolutely obliterated everything!

What we used was black powder, which is refined
gun powder.
In our eight very very heavy cannons!
Mike: They were yes!

So what we had was a bronze cannon, we filled
it with only 10 grams of black powder.

And then we put some wadding in and a single
Brussels sprout right down the cannon tube!
It was amazing!

Greg: What speed do you reckon it came out
at?
Mike: I have no idea.

I wish I could measure it, it must be about
six or seven hundred miles an hour.

Greg: And it was literally a couple of frames
and it was gone.

And we set up a little target area on the
table here -- with bubbly -- and it absolutely
annihilated everything!
Mike: I think we deserve one to be honest.
Greg: Yeah we do.

And have a look at this while Mike is pouring
a drink.

Look this is the hole that it went through,
straight through the sheet yeah fine, but
also straight through the table!
That's just a Brussels sprout doing that!
What!
Anyway, Mike, cheers!
The 12 Explosions of Christmas!
They're going well!
Cheers!
